about_the_game:
Demo features:

  • The first 3-ish of 21-ish missions in the full game
  • A little something extra at the end that's demo-exclusive
  • Takes around 1.5 to 2 hours to play
  • When the full game comes out later this year, your progress will carry over if you like

content_descriptors.notes:
The game has a stylised rather than realistic look, but people sure do get shot, struck, slammed into walls, smashed through windows, set on fire, etc. There is a little stylised blood.

The plot features a fictional illegal drug prominently. Use of it is not encouraged nor directly depicted.

detailed_description:

name: Tactical Breach Wizards Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700 2.6 GHz or AMD Phenom 9950 Quad Core 2.6 GHz
  • Graphics: 1GB ATI Radeon HD 5770, 1GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or better

short_description: The demo features the first 3-ish of 21-ish missions in the full game, plus a little something extra at the end that's demo-exclusive.
